statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id < 5;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE preferences ->> 'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name,email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id,name,email,preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM whiteboard_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT pref_id,user_id,background_color,pen_color FROM whiteboard_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM whiteboard_preferences wp JOIN user_profiles up ON wp.user_id = up.user_id WHERE background_color = 'blue';
SELECT name, email, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, pen_color FROM whiteboard_preferences WHERE user_id = (SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM user_profiles);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, session_name FROM whiteboard_sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '456e89b7-12d3-89a4-4266-17423456780';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' LIMIT 1;
SELECT session_id, session_name, created_at FROM whiteboard_sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, email, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN user_profiles ON user_roles.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences ->> 'theme' = 'dark' AND preferences ->> 'language' = 'en';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_settings WHERE theme IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.full_name, s.theme FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.theme = 'dark';
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activities GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM user_messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 4 AND preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM user_messages WHERE sender_id = 5 AND receiver_id = 6 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
